pr_title: [nuki] Add smart lock door sensor state as new channel (#8438)

timeline.bodyText: These constants don't seem to be used? Can they be removed.
timeline.author: Hilbrand

replies.bodyText: They are not required. I added them just like the other LOCK_STATES_.... which are also not used.
replies.author: SeeAge
